name: Volume 01 Assets
description: This manifest anchors the supplementary data and visualization assets for Volume 01: Genesis & System Mandate. These files provide the raw, verifiable data backing the narrative.

contents.name: Genesis_Ledger.csv
contents.description: The complete, 731-entry chronological ledger of every pivotal milestone in NeuralBlitz's evolution, from Prompt Zero to the current epoch.

contents.name: version_graph.svg
contents.description: The canonical SVG visualization of the NeuralBlitz version lineage and major developmental forks, as rendered from the master GraphML source.
